name: My trip to the mountain
description:
You decide to visit your favourite mountain. It's cold and your car doesn't work. You decide to stay in order to see the thaw, hoping it helps you survive. Explore the mountain and find objects that help you in this adventure.

 2020 Unreal Spring Jam entry.

Team name: BubuVolve

My name and e-mail: Galo Fernandez (galo.frn@gmail.com)

Videogame name: My trip to the mountain

Content created before the jam: All assets by kenney. Telescope and backpack from cgtrade. Animations from mixamo.  

Controls:

WASD/Left thumbstick: Move

Shift/Right trigger: Run

E/A: Pickup/interact

Q/X: Eat

Spacebar/B: Snowboard.
